values.ctor:
<init>(a: Appendable!)
            Constructs a new formatter with the specified destination.

<init>(l: Locale!)
            Constructs a new formatter with the specified locale.

<init>(a: Appendable!, l: Locale!)
            Constructs a new formatter with the specified destination and locale.

<init>(fileName: String!)
            Constructs a new formatter with the specified file name.

<init>(fileName: String!, csn: String!)
            Constructs a new formatter with the specified file name and charset.

<init>(fileName: String!, csn: String!, l: Locale!)
            Constructs a new formatter with the specified file name, charset, and locale.

<init>(file: File!)
            Constructs a new formatter with the specified file.

<init>(file: File!, csn: String!)
            Constructs a new formatter with the specified file and charset.

<init>(file: File!, csn: String!, l: Locale!)
            Constructs a new formatter with the specified file, charset, and locale.

<init>(ps: PrintStream!)
            Constructs a new formatter with the specified print stream.

<init>(os: OutputStream!)
            Constructs a new formatter with the specified output stream.

<init>(os: OutputStream!, csn: String!)
            Constructs a new formatter with the specified output stream and charset.

<init>(os: OutputStream!, csn: String!, l: Locale!)
            Constructs a new formatter with the specified output stream, charset, and locale.

values.desc: Writes a formatted string to this object's destination using the specified format string and arguments.

values.code: format(l: Locale!, format: String!, vararg args: Any!)
values.desc: Writes a formatted string to this object's destination using the specified locale, format string, and arguments.
Returns the IOException last thrown by this formatter's Appendable.
Returns the locale set by the construction of this formatter.
Returns the destination for the output.
Returns the result of invoking toString() on the destination for the output.
